page.title: 15Meadow cottage Worlingworth
page.content: Q1Could you tell me about the history of this house? A1A house was here in 1604.The present house has old beams,lathe & plaster walls.A porch,kitchen & some windows were added in 1920.It was once 3 cott- ages & is now 1.There are still 2 sta- ircases.The deeds date to 1871,now own -ner occupied,it once belonged to the Trustees of Eye. Q2What was the house like when you came A2Bought in 1964 it needed plaster & paint.There was no hot water,just 2 open fires. Q3What changes have you made? A3We have installed central heating & hot water in the bathroom & kitchen, exposed a fireplace,built on a garage, damp proofed some of the downstairs floors & reroofed the bathroom & kitchen.
